# Python
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Virtual Environment
venv/
env/
.env

# FastAPI
.pytest_cache/

# IDEs and Editors
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Logs
*.log

# Database
*.sqlite3

# Temporary files
*.tmp

# Build files
build/
dist/
*.egg-info/

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local

# Documentation
docs/_build/

# Coverage reports
htmlcov/
.coverage
.coverage.*
coverage.xml

# Pytest
.pytest_cache/

# mypy
.mypy_cache/

# Jupyter Notebook
.ipynb_checkpoints
